code: import React from"react";import{AppConfig,showConnect,UserSession}from"@stacks/connect";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const appConfig=new AppConfig(["store_write","publish_data"]);export const userSession=new UserSession({appConfig});function authenticate(){showConnect({appDetails:{name:"Stacks React Starter",icon:window.location.origin+"/logo512.png"},redirectTo:"/",onFinish:()=>{window.location.reload();},userSession});}function disconnect(){userSession.signUserOut("/");}const ConnectWallet=()=>{if(userSession.isUserSignedIn()){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"Connect",onClick:disconnect,children:"Disconnect Wallet"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["mainnet: ",userSession.loadUserData().profile.stxAddress.mainnet]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["testnet: ",userSession.loadUserData().profile.stxAddress.testnet]})]});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"theme-btn",onClick:authenticate,children:"Connect Wallet"});};export default ConnectWallet;
